abstract.shortdesc: In this lesson, you will prepare each of the courses for your PB&J meal.

taskbody.prereq: The preparation phase comes only after the menu is solidified and the ingredients and supplies are completely gathered and arranged.

taskbody.context: Complete the following steps to prepare the chips and salsa:

step.cmd: Remove the lid from the salsa.
Pour the salsa into a bowl.

taskbody.context: For each patron, make one sandwich by completing the following steps:

step.cmd: Take out two slices of bread and lay them flat next to each other.
With a spreading knife, spread peanut butter on one slice of bread.
Spread jelly on the other slice of bread.
Put the two slices of bread together so that the sides with the peanut butter and jelly are touching each other.
Refer to the instructions on the roll of frozen cookie dough.

taskbody.context: For each patron, complete the following steps to prepare the milk to be served:

step.cmd: Steady the glass with one hand.
Pour the milk into the glass with the other hand.

tutorialSummary.title: Lesson checkpoint
tutorialSummary.shortdesc: In this lesson, you learned the proper steps for preparing the courses for a PB&J meal.

tutorialSummaryBody.assessment:
To review, ask yourself the following questions:
What are the steps for preparing a PB&J sandwich?
How many hands should I use when pouring milk?
